name: Escape The Glubinka
description:
December 6, 1994. the village of Glubnkovo.

You were driving home after a very difficult day along an abandoned village and did not notice a tree peeking out ahead. In an instant, complete darkness overtook you and you passed out. Everything you do next is a continuation of this backstory.

To survive the Russian glubinka you need


- Fight the habitants of Russian glubinka
- Find ammo for your best friend Makarov
- Your chances to stay alive will increase by eating bread and drinking high quality ☭hardkvass☭
- Stay out of radiation ejections

Additionally


- Complete all tasks to get rewards
- Collect hidden treasures
- Complete all 15 unique achievements

- Vasya recommends this game!
